title: Ticket #2153: Undocumented settings: SMTP_SERVER, MAIL_FROM
description:
MAIL_FROM is undocumented, and STMP_SERVER is only briefly mentioned in the version history for 6.6.

The following should be run by someone who knows the Windows side of this better, but here's an attempt:

MAIL_FROM - The address notification emails appear to come from on Windows. This setting is only used on Windows. If not specified, the From address may be non-sensical.

STMP_SERVER - Server to route notifications emails through on Windows. Generates errors if not specified. This setting is only used on Windows.
